methodology.burden_score: 0.5 × DALYs + 50 × Deaths + 10 × log₁₀(Prevalence) [or 10 × log₁₀(DALYs) if Deaths/Prevalence unavailable]
methodology.gap_score: Three-tier: zero-pub penalty (95), category thresholds (Infectious/Neglected), burden-normalized intensity
methodology.ros: Σ Burden_Score for diseases with ≤2 publications
methodology.source: Corpas et al. 2025, Annual Review of Biomedical Data Science
